To everyone screaming at the author, you are a big fucking idiot for not looking at the big picture. You are just like Eren, you are so fucking dense and don't even notice the one-sided love of Mikasa. After you're done with her services, you probably won't return back her feelings and just throw her on the road because your mind is clouded with vengeance. I fucking hated Eren's denial of Mikasa's love and just incredibly selfish because of his "duty" as a titan shifter, Levi's entrance of being the cuckold villain was the smoking gun for Eren to understand people around him. Besides, Levi is a calm and chill dude most of the time so he was the best one for the job. Also, this was made 6 years ago so Levi's surname wasn't even released.
